div.bibl: Polonia, Vol. XXX, No. 24, June 11, 1936POLISH TOBACCO SHOP IN SOUTH CHICAGO, ILL.

body.p: Wladyslaw Bernatowicz is the only wholesale tobacconist in South Chicago. He has a very large trade, especially among Polish firms.

He started his business in 1916 on Commercial avenue, later on he moved into his own building at 8605 Manistee avenue where he has conducted his tobacco business very successfully for the last twenty years.
